Properties.ProtectedString:
local ASSETS = { CarMesh = 150333686; CarTX = 150975207; Icon = 150975193; }
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild('Handle') local Character = nil local Torso = nil local Humanoid = nil local CarPrefab = Game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(147928844):GetChildren()[1] --local CarPrefab = Game.ReplicatedStorage.Car:Clone() local MyMouse = nil local Camera = Workspace.CurrentCamera
local CurrentCar = newCar
local GuiPrefab = script:WaitForChild('HWGui')
local CurrentGui = nil
local function DestroyCar() --print("Calling unitialized destroy car func") end
function OnActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end if Character and Torso and Humanoid then Tool.Enabled = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 DestroyCar() Handle.Transparency = 1 CurrentCar = CarPrefab:Clone() CurrentCar:TranslateBy((Torso.CFrame.p + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 3) - CurrentCar:GetModelCFrame().p) CurrentCar.Parent = Camera
local CurrentCarMesh = CurrentCar and CurrentCar:FindFirstChild('Chassis') and CurrentCar:FindFirstChild('Chassis'):FindFirstChild('Mesh') CurrentCarMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. tostring(ASSETS['CarMesh']) CurrentCarMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. tostring(ASSETS['CarTX'])
CurrentGui = GuiPrefab:Clone() if Player and Player:FindFirstChild('PlayerGui') then CurrentGui.Parent = Player:FindFirstChild('PlayerGui') end Camera.CameraSubject = CurrentCar Camera.CameraType = 'Follow' local newCarScript = CurrentCar:WaitForChild('HWCarScript') local SteeringEvent = newCarScript:WaitForChild('SteeringEvent') local ThrottleEvent = newCarScript:WaitForChild('ThrottleEvent') local ThrottleEvent = newCarScript:WaitForChild('ThrottleEvent') newCarScript.Parent = Character
DestroyCar = function() if CurrentCar then CurrentCar:Destroy() CurrentCar = nil end if newCarScript then newCarScript:Destroy() newCarScript = nil end if CurrentGui then CurrentGui:Destroy() CurrentGui = nil end Handle.Transparency = 0 end
local function onCharDied() DestroyCar() if Humanoid then if Camera then Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid Camera.CameraType = 'Custom' end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end
Humanoid.Died:connect(onCharDied)
Spawn(function() while true do wait() if Character ~= Player.Character or (CurrentCar and (CurrentCar.Parent == nil or CurrentCar:GetModelCFrame().p.Y < -300)) then onCharDied() end end end) if MyMouse then local downKeys = { [string.byte('s')] = false; [string.byte('w')] = false; [string.byte('a')] = false; [string.byte('d')] = false } local function UpdateEvents() --FireServer local rightArrow = 19 local leftArrow = 20 local forwardArrow = 17 local backArrow = 18 ThrottleEvent:Fire(((downKeys[string.byte('w')] or downKeys[forwardArrow]) and 1 or 0) + ((downKeys[string.byte('s')] or downKeys[backArrow]) and -1 or 0)) SteeringEvent:Fire(((downKeys[string.byte('d')] or downKeys[rightArrow]) and 1 or 0) + ((downKeys[string.byte('a')] or downKeys[leftArrow]) and -1 or 0)) end MyMouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key = string.lower(key) downKeys[string.byte(key)] = true UpdateEvents() end) MyMouse.KeyUp:connect(function(key) key = string.lower(key) downKeys[string.byte(key)] = false UpdateEvents() end) UpdateEvents() else print("No mouse found") end newCarScript.Disabled = false
wait(5) -- Cooldown Tool.Enabled = true else print("Couldn't find Torso") end end
function OnEquipped(mouse) Handle.Transparency = 0 Character = Tool.Parent Player = Game:GetService('Players'):GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Torso = Character:WaitForChild('Torso') Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild('Humanoid') MyMouse = mouse Player.CharacterAdded:connect(function() Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid Camera.CameraType = 'Custom' end) end
function OnUnequipped() DestroyCar() if Humanoid then if Camera then Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid Camera.CameraType = 'Custom' end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
local HandleMesh = Handle and Handle:FindFirstChild('Mesh')
HandleMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. tostring(ASSETS['CarMesh']) HandleMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. tostring(ASSETS['CarTX']) Tool.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. tostring(ASSETS['Icon'])

Properties.string: Use the WASD keys to drive the car!

Properties.ProtectedString:
local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
